name: California Emergency Rental Assistance
description: Payment of past-due rent and utilities to prevent eviction
fullDescription: California's Emergency Rental Assistance Program helps income-eligible renters who have been impacted by the pandemic pay past-due rent and utilities to avoid eviction.
whatTheyOffer:
- Payment of past-due rent (up to 18 months)
- Payment of past-due utilities
- Future rent assistance in some cases
- Eviction protection while application pending
- Direct payment to landlord/utility company
howToGetIt:
1. Visit HousingIsKey.com or call 833-430-2122
2. Must be income-eligible (80% of area median income or below)
3. Must have COVID-related financial hardship
4. Must have past-due rent or utilities
5. Submit application with required documentation
6. Landlord participation required for rent assistance
keywords: emergency rental assistance, rent help, COVID, back rent, utility help, eviction prevention, California, low-income
